name: Cump
description:
Cump is a 2D platformer game. It may look simple at first glance but do not get fooled by it. The game is supposed to be hard and challenging. The main goal is to jump obviously and find pink square named pinky. 

Pro tips
  • Use ledges as much as possible
  • Don´t fall 
Assets used:

Tileset:

https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas

Other:

https://wishforge.itch.io/free-platformer-pixel-art-assets

Sounds:

https://harvey656.itch.io/8-bit-game-sound-effects-collection

https://timbeek.itch.io/royalty-free-music-pack

Controls:

Arrow keys or A/D - Movement

SPACE - Jump
